Album: Just Like Fire (from "Alice Through The Looking Glass")
Lyric:
[00:06.04]I know that I am runnin' out of time
[00:08.25]I want it all, mmm, mmm
[00:11.64]And I'm wishing they'd stop trying to turn me off
[00:14.12]I want it on, mmm, mmm
[00:17.60]And I'm walking on a wire, trying to go higher
[00:20.90]Feels like I'm surrounded by clowns and liars
[00:23.78]Even when I give it all away
[00:25.90]I want it all, mmm, mmm
[00:29.08]We came here to run it, run it, run it
[00:34.92]We came here to run it, run it, run it
[00:40.72]Just like fire, burnin' up the way
[00:43.62]If I could light the world up for just one day
[00:46.57]Watch this madness, colorful charade
[00:49.49]No one can be just like me any way
[00:52.46]Just like magic, I'll be flying free
[00:55.37]I'mma disappear when they come for me
[00:58.27]I kick that ceiling, what you gonna say?
[01:01.26]No one can be just like me anyway
[01:04.29]Just like fire, uh
[01:10.78]And people like to laugh at you cause they are all the same, mmm, mmm
